price: 3. Ma markaan dhimanno oo aan noqonno carro (miyaa na la soo nooleyn)? (arrin)kaasu waa soo Noqosho Fog.
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
